DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte3Bit0_STO_1
DigitalIOItem.Description: Shows the state of the STO 1.

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDOByte1Bit4_ToggleBit
DigitalIOItem.Description: Extends the ControlWord with additional bits. Toggle bit is used as an alive signal.

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte1Bit0_IsReferenced
DigitalIOItem.Description: Shows if the gripper is referenced.

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDOByte1Bit7_ParameterStrobe
DigitalIOItem.Description: Extends the ControlWord with additional bits. Parameter strobe is used to trigger a handshake protokol to write parameters.

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDOByte2_ParameterID
DigitalIOItem.Description: ExtendedDigitalOutput Byte 2 Bit 0 to 3 - Used to chose a parameter

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDOByte2_MotionProfile
DigitalIOItem.Description: ExtendedDigitalOutput Byte 2 Bit 4 to 7 - Used to trigger motion profiles

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte1Bit1_Moving
DigitalIOItem.Description: Shows if the gripper is moving.

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte1Bit2_ProgramError
DigitalIOItem.Description: Indicates a program error.

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte1Bit3_CurrentLimitation
DigitalIOItem.Description: Initcates if the current limitation is active

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte1Bit4_Toggle
DigitalIOItem.Description: Shows if the controller is running (alive bit)

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte1Bit5_SoftwareLimitNeg
DigitalIOItem.Description: Shows if the outer software limit is reached.

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte1Bit7_ParameterAck
DigitalIOItem.Description: ParameterAck is used to acknowledge a handshake protokol to write parameters.

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte1Bit6_SoftwareLimitPos
DigitalIOItem.Description: Shows if the inner software limit is reached.

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte2_2_MotionProfile
DigitalIOItem.Description: ExtendedDigitalInput Byte 2 Bit 4 to 7 - Used to show the active motion profile

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte2_1_ParameterID
DigitalIOItem.Description: ExtendedDigitalInput Byte 2 Bit 0 to 3 - Used to show a parameter

DigitalIOItem.Name: HelpDI_IdValue
DigitalIOItem.Description: These two byte are used to transmit the actual value of a specific parameter or the error value of PE, MF or EC.

DigitalIOItem.Name: SWBit00_ReadyToSwitchOn
DigitalIOItem.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIOItem.Name: SWBit01_SwitchedOn
DigitalIOItem.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIOItem.Name: SWBit02_OperationEnabled
DigitalIOItem.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIOItem.Name: SWBit03_MotorFailure
DigitalIOItem.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIOItem.Name: SWBit04_VoltageEnabled
DigitalIOItem.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIOItem.Name: SWBit05_QuickStop
DigitalIOItem.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIOItem.Name: SWBit06_SwitchOnDisabled
DigitalIOItem.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIOItem.Name: SWBit07_Warning
DigitalIOItem.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIOItem.Name: SWBit10_TargetReached
DigitalIOItem.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord).

DigitalIOItem.Name: SWBit11_InternalLimitActive
DigitalIOItem.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord).

DigitalIOItem.Name: EDIByte3Bit1_STO_2
DigitalIOItem.Description: Shows the state of the STO 2.

IOGroup.Description:
This I/O Group contains the In-/Outputs which are used for controlling the gripper zimmer R840.
IMPORTANT: The Signal Group must have the name "ZimmerR840", if its intended to import the delivered partial project.
